name: Rivergate
role_in_state: Principal inland estuary and reagent transit point
culture_adjustments: river-tide rituals prioritized over open-sea rites
guilds control dockspace and apprenticeship routes
voyage oaths adapted for short river runs
constraints: seasonal access limited by silt and tides
licensed guild monopoly on reagent handling
notes: key waypoint for state maritime trade; upstream land use affects access
apprentice labor central to reagent processing and smallcraft work
